description: Manage site-to-site VPN gateway connections packet capture.

commands.name: az network vpn-gateway connection packet-capture start
commands.summary: Starts packet capture on Vpn connection in the specified resource group.
commands.syntax:
az network vpn-gateway connection packet-capture start [--connection-name]
                                                       [--filter-data]
                                                       [--gateway-name]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--link-connection-names]
                                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
examples: az network  vpn-gateway connection packet-capture start -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyVpnGateway --connection-name MyVpnGatewayConnection --link-connection-names MyVpnGatewayConnection
